original_text: So the next day, Paul went with the four men. He joined with them when they washed to make themselves clean in front of God. Then he went into the yard of the temple. He told the priest there when the four men would finish their promise to God. This would be after seven days. After that, each man would give an animal as a sacrifice to God.
korean_text: 바울이 이 사람들을 데리고 이튿날 그들과 함께 결례를 행하고 성전에 들어가서 각 사람을 위하여 제사 드릴 때까지의 결례 기간이 만기된 것을 신고하니라

sentences.original_text: Paul went with the four men
He joined with them when they washed
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들이 씻을 때 그들과 함께했습니다

sentences.original_text: to make themselves clean in front of God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님 앞에서 자신들을 정결하게 하기 위해

sentences.original_text: Then he went into the yard of the temple
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 다음 그는 성전 뜰로 들어갔습니다

sentences.original_text: when the four men would finish their promise to God
sentences.korean_translation: 네 사람이 하나님께 한 약속을 언제 끝낼지

sentences.original_text: This would be after seven days
each man would give an animal
